mapper.select: select * from( SELECT SUM(AA.TOTALBILL) TOTALBILL , AA.BIRTH ,AA.CHAREGDATE chRegdate FROM ( SELECT C.TOTALBILL TOTALBILL , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(m.birth,8,1) = '1' OR SUBSTR(m.birth,8,1) = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END birth ,to_char(c.chregdate,'yyyy-mm') charegdate from CHARGE C, MEMBERSHIP M WHERE c.memnum=m.memnum ) AA WHERE AA.charegdate BETWEEN #{date} AND #{date1} GROUP BY AA.BIRTH,AA.CHAREGDATE )PIVOT(sum(totalbill) for birth in(1 AS MAN,2 AS WOMAN)) order by chRegdate

select * from( SELECT SUM(AA.TOTALBILL) TOTALBILL , AA.BIRTH ,AA.CHAREGDATE chRegdate FROM ( SELECT C.TOTALBILL TOTALBILL , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(m.birth,8,1) = '1' OR SUBSTR(m.birth,8,1) = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END birth ,to_char(c.chregdate,'yyyy') charegdate from CHARGE C, MEMBERSHIP M WHERE c.memnum=m.memnum ) AA WHERE AA.charegdate BETWEEN #{date} AND #{date1} GROUP BY AA.BIRTH,AA.CHAREGDATE )PIVOT(sum(totalbill) for birth in(1 AS MAN,2 AS WOMAN)) order by chRegdate

select * from ( SELECT * FROM ( select c.totalbill totalbill ,substr(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') + 1 - (substr(m.birth,0,2)+ (case when substr(m.birth,8,1) < 3 then 1900 when substr(m.birth,8,1) >= 3 then 2000 end)),0,1) as age ,to_char(c.chregdate,'yyyy') chRegdate from MEMBERSHIP m,charge c where m.memnum=c.memnum ) AA WHERE AA.chRegdate BETWEEN #{date} AND #{date1} ) CC PIVOT( SUM(totalbill) FOR AGE IN (1 AS TEENS ,2 AS TWENTIES,3 AS THIRTIES,4 AS FORTIES,5 AS FIFTIES,6 AS SIXTIES) ) ORDER BY chRegdate
